subject: Order SSN4729
description_text:
Have you sent SSN4729 have not heard a word from you

This message contains information that may be privileged or confidential and is the property of the Capgemini Group. It is intended only for the person to whom it is addressed. conversations.body_text: Hi Ahlin, Mikael,     Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping.
